Tomato

The tomato is a common ... (brief general description) ...

Seasons suitable

All year round.

Tools needed

A watering bucket would be essential, while a spade, a shovel, a garden fork are recommended.

Space required

Growing them in a small clay pot would be sufficient, so balconies and patios are big enough.
